channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Polo Video Gallery – Best wordpress video gallery plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Polo Video Gallery – Best wordpress video gallery plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24415|2024-08-03T19:28:24.017Z -- unknown -- polo%20video%20gallery%20%E2%80%93%20best%20wordpress%20video%20gallery%20plugin
item.description: The Polo Video Gallery – Best wordpress video gallery plugin WordPress plugin through 1.2 does not sanitise or validate the parameters from its shortcode, allowing users with a role as low as contributor to set Cross-Site Scripting payload in them which will be triggered in the page/s with the embed malicious shortcode
